## uniqueBy variable

Create a unique array of objects from a getter function or a property list.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
uniqueBy: <GItem = any, GKey = any>(array: GItem[], getValue: string | (string | number)[] | ((item: GItem) => GKey), fromStart?: boolean) => GItem[]
```
